definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Special teams will be sent occasionally to patrol at major oil and chemical ports.
sentences.chinese: 政府將不定期地安排特派團巡視主要的石油化學港口。

sentences.english: These switches are ideal for use in Off-shore Exploration and Petro-chemical processing.
sentences.chinese: 主要用於近海開發和石油化學加工。
